body.name: Magnifying Mirror with Light 10X, Lighted Magnifying Mirror 10X Magnification with 3 Suction Cups, 4inch Rechargeable Magnified Travel Makeup Mirror Magnifying Pocket Mirror with Scissors, Dimmable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 53 mins
features: 【10X MAGNIFICATION】10X magnifying mirror with light is the most popular magnified mirror, the pores of the face are clearly visible which is good for check makeup details, shaving, or deep cleaning, plucking eyebrows, blackhead/blemish removal, wearing contact lenses and more. It helps make sure everything on your face looks exactly good. PLS KINDLY NOTED: You need to stay close to the magnifying mirror approx 3-inch to get a clear view.

【ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS】Natural daylight LED provides the magnifying mirror the most accurate natural light that you encounter throughout a day. Control the brightness through long pressing the touch sensor with our Seamless Dimming Technology.

【RECHARGEABLE】Say goodbye to disposable batteries and dangling cords! Your USB rechargeable lighted magnifying mirror 10X will shine bright for up to 5 hours at the max-brightness per full charge ( Type-c charging cable included).

【TRAVEL READY】Portable and lightweight design makes this 10x magnifying mirror with light easy to store and convenient to take with you wherever you go. Compact mirror size: 4*4inches; Weight: 0.15lbs.
【PREMIUM GROOMING SCISSORS】Made of stainless steel structure to ensure long lasting performance, can be used for personal care, facial hair removal, ear, nose and eyebrow trimming.

【GIFT IDEA】This 10X magnified mirror with light and grooming scissors travel set is specially designed for people with delicate facial needs and blurred vision, It’s a great gift choice for elders-parents, grandparents and beautiful girls.

【THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW】This lighted makeup mirror with 10x magnification helps people to make sure everything on your face is exactly how & where it should be. The 10X magnification is powerful & intensive, you need to stay very CLOSE, nearly 3-inch to the mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for contact lens emergencies.
reviews.reviewText: Once, in a blue moon, I will have a contact lens go wonky on me when I am out and about. I got this so that I would be able to see what I’m doing to fix things. The light and magnification are perfect. it only had two of the three suction cups to attach to the back, but that is sufficient for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is GREAT! Magnification is wonderful & the light works fantastic. Best product of its type I've ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the magnification of this mirror and the lights are a VERY helpful touch. My only complaint is the light does not hold charge for long enough so the lighting dims very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright enough and mirror has good clarity
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Suupvaor Lighted Magnifying Mirror 5X Magnification, Magnifying Mirror with Light 5X, Rechargeable 5X Magnified Mirror with Light, 4inch Dimmable Compact Handheld Pocket Mirror with Scissors.I ordered this because I have an identical mirror, but at 10x magnification, and that is too strong for some of my needs.The clarity on the mirror is good. The highest setting for brightness is bright enough for me.It comes with a USB charging cable, but no block (we all have many of these).It also comes with small, round-tip, scissors.The three suction cups for holding it to the mirror work well. Be careful when pulling it off the mirror so that you don't rip the silicone cups. Do one cup at a time and it will be fine.My only gripe is that there is not an auto shutoff for the light and just a light touch on the button while putting it away (I store it in its box) will turn it on. So, be careful or you'll have to recharge the battery. If you always keep it mounted on the mirror, this won't be an issue for you.Overall, 4 stars from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super magnifying and sticks to anything
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I finally have a mirror I can use when traveling! I always find it really difficult to find a mirror to tweeze my eyebrows when traveling. My eyesight isn’t what it used to be and standard hotel mirrors don’t cut it. I’ve tried other travel mirrors and found a variety of issues with them. They’re typically too short, too low or just difficult to use. I’m really happy to have found this mirror because it has suction cups on it and I can just stick it to a hotel mirror. I also have a make up case that has a mirror on it but no magnification and I can stick this to that. 30x mag is going to show you EVERYTHING. No more walking around looking like Sasquatch on vacation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Now I can see what I'm doing (plucking my brows, putting on makeup). Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Fits inside vanity mirror
reviews.reviewText: Love this little mirror! Fits perfectly inside my vanity mirror cabinet and when I want to use I just open. Easy to charge and first charge lasted a couple of months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too small to get a full view.
reviews.reviewText: It does indeed magnify well however the mirror size only allows you to view from your eyebrow to the tip of your nose before it gets blurry. The magnification is only in the center of the mirror so your viewing area is only about 2 inches in diameter overall. I am returning for a larger mirror.
